title: Stag and Dagger Tip: Django Django
content:
Funky, inventive and loveable, Django Django are another of the must seeâ€™s at this weekend Stag and Dagger. Performing at both London and Glasgow dates of Stag and Dagger, they are sure to generate positive reviews from the huge numbers of media critics attending. Taking inspiration from such a wide range of talent, including Primal Scream, Talking Heads and Public Enemy; Django Django create free flowing, melodic math rock songs, a perfect example being most recently single Wor, which builds upon the edgy guitar riffs which Foals so spectaculary brought back into fashion in 2008.

Listen to Wor
